data.title: Confins
data.desc: A core banking system developed to be the backbone of Indonesian finances

details.desc: Confins is a core banking system that I helped develop with the teams in AdIns (Advance Innovations) to help financial instituion manage large scale transactions. The system is used to help manage loan application, credit scoring, collateral appraisal, collection system, and many more. It's built using angularJS, SQL Server, ASP.NET, and RabbitMQ

data.title: Tokopedia Plus
data.desc: A subscription service that gives exclusive benefits in Tokopedia

details.desc: Tokopedia Plus is a subscription service that I developed together with the team from Tokopedia that aims to help it's customer save more for every transaction in tokopedia by giving special benefits to it's subscriber. It's built using NSQ, gRPC, Go, Java, PostgreQL, Yugabyte, Redis, and React

data.title: Coupon Management
data.desc: A loyalty program by that aims to distribute suitable coupon to Tokopedia users

details.desc: Coupon Management is a benefit distribution system that I developed with the team in Tokopedia that aims to effectively distribute coupon to users in tokopedia by analyzing users behaviour, predicting their next transaction, and giving appropriate coupon with their next transaction. This system is built using Tensorflow, Flask, NSQ, gRPC, Go, Python, PostgreQL, Yugabyte, Redis, and React

data.title: Funcraft
data.desc: A task tracking gamification application aimed to increase performance and productivity

details.desc: Funcraft is a task tracking gamification aimed to increase performance and productivity. Funcraft was made as a submission for a business case competition by Mandiri Tunas Finance and became a finalist. Funcraft as a Web Application utilizing frameworks such as VueJs, ExpressJs, and MySql.

data.title: DeText
data.desc: OCR application made to extract text from images made using tensorflow and flask

details.desc: DeText is an OCR application made to extract text from images. Detext is an application submitted as the GUI for a thesis project involving AI Tech such as CNN, LSTM, and Mask R-CNN. DeText was made using frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, Flask, and Svelte

data.title: Speed Mail
data.desc: a Mail client inspired by Speedwagon made using Vue and Mongodb

details.desc: SpeedMail is a Mail client inspired by the anime character Speedwagon from the anime JoJo. Speedmail was made as a submission for a class project to better understand the web tech stack. SpeedMail was made using frameworks such as VueJs, ExpressJs, Bootstrap, and MongoDB.

data.title: M-Bank
data.desc: A redesigned BCA m banking application made using C#

details.desc: M-Bank is a redesigned BCA m banking application made using C#. M-Bank was made as a submission for a class project aimed to better understand how to create a desktop GUI application. M-Bank was made using frameworks such as ASP.Net, and SQL Server.

data.title: Prabu Hotel
data.desc: a prototype hotel reservation system made using java

details.desc: Prabu Hotel is a prototype hotel reservation system made using java. Prabu Hotel was made as a submission for a class project to better understand ways of implementing OOP. Prabu Hotel was made using frameworks such as Spring Boot, Apache Velocity, Maven, and Oracle DB
